attributes.action: I propose the NHS as a group is awarded The George Cross
attributes.additional_details: Our children need wholesome role models to aspire to reflect, what better than a nurse, doctor, surgeon, scientist  or chemist
attributes.background: Have the George Cross added to the NHS logo on their name badges and uniforms, they deserve permanent recognition for their commitment to the public and their sacrifice during this pandemic

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
